title: Ticket #975: daemon address should update on reconfig
description:
Changes to PRIVATE_NETWORK_INTERFACE, PRIVATE_NETWORK_NAME, and TCP_FORWARDING_HOST should be reflected in the published daemon address.

I am pushing a fix for this to 7.5.0. It can still take up to an update interval for the changes to be published.
